about_the_game:
A drifter finds themselves in a town knee deep in a dire situation. The town is going to be taken over by a big ol' company! And you just so happened to arrive right on time to help out these citizens in need!

  • Play through 4 chapters of that shows the best of Clement County!

  • Turn-based combat with up to 3 other NPC companions that you love so very much!

  • Also those companions I was talking about? There's more than 20 of them you could unlock!

  • Multiple areas in one of the dumbest parts of the world!

  • Build your character by leveling up, eating pizza, drinking soda and frickin' fighting!

  • Fight enemies like feral zombies, construction workers, crocodile dudes and other bad things!

  • Amazing special attacks like Vomit, Super Kick, Skull Crack and MP3 Player!

  • Everything, art and code, hand-made with love!!!

content_descriptors.notes: Exaggerated and/or comedic depictions of death, although it is pixel art, characters can be seen melting into piles of blood and gore, exploding into smoke/ash/dust. Teammates can be seen in varying states of damage, from unharmed to near-death. Some suggestive themes, such as a female character with an exaggerated bust size.

detailed_description:
A drifter finds themselves in a town knee deep in a dire situation. The town is going to be taken over by a big ol' company! And you just so happened to arrive right on time to help out these citizens in need!

  • Play through 4 chapters of that shows the best of Clement County!

  • Turn-based combat with up to 3 other NPC companions that you love so very much!

  • Also those companions I was talking about? There's more than 20 of them you could unlock!

  • Multiple areas in one of the dumbest parts of the world!

  • Build your character by leveling up, eating pizza, drinking soda and frickin' fighting!

  • Fight enemies like feral zombies, construction workers, crocodile dudes and other bad things!

  • Amazing special attacks like Vomit, Super Kick, Skull Crack and MP3 Player!

  • Everything, art and code, hand-made with love!!!
name: How West Clement Was Kinda Won

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Any Windows version after Windows 8.
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU with 2 GHz and Multi-threading
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any integrated or dedicated graphics card.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Most assets are loaded at the start of the game, as well as any intended update and DLC so an extra 500 MB of RAM may be needed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Any Windows version after Windows 8.
  • Processor: Multi-core CPU with 2 GHz and Multi-threading
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any integrated or dedicated graphics card.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A video game of unmatched proportion and elegance, also cool things and where you fight things like zombies and stuff and have I mentioned that there's pizza too?
